# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Transformers.pm ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Transformers.pm ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/testCombined1.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/testCombined1.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/testCombined1.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/testCombined1.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/testCombined1.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_25_SON/testCombined1.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} testCombined1.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} testCombined1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_25_SON/testCombined1.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_25_SON/testCombined1.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;valgrind;mutualinductor")
